0.speaker: sol
0.text: Hey, Dolly?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Yes Sol?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Do you know where we are?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: I believe we're in the forest, keeping busy and out of the way while dad fixes the car tire.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Right, but do you know where we are in the forest?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh, well we should be...

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Um...

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh dear, I don't see the pathway we came from.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Are we lost?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, I think we are.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: What?! Oh no no no! Mom and dad will be worried sick!

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: How are we going to get back to them?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Well... I guess we'll just have to find our way back out.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: It can't be too hard, right?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh, but what if we get more lost? Or one of us gets hurt? I don't want my face to get chipped... Or yours, for that matter.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Well, we can't just stay in one spot right? Then we'll never have a chance of getting out.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Well, I suppose you have a point... But we'll be careful, right?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Of course we will.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh, good! Then let's continue on.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Wait! Wait!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Huh?! What is it?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Don't walk any further! There's something over there! If we walk any further, it'll see us!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Where? I don't see it.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: See the glowing eyes, right between the branches? Look a little closer...

1.speaker: sol
1.text: Woah, you're right! What is that?

1.speaker: dolly
1.text: Well, I can't be completely sure without seeing more than the eyes, but my guess is it's a wild forest squirrel.

1.speaker: dolly
1.text: While similar in appearance to the squirrels we typically see at home, they have a much more aggressive nature and are very territorial. They will run towards anything they see to scare it off. We definitely don't want it to see us!

1.speaker: sol
1.text: But that's good to know! Where did you learn that?

1.speaker: dolly
1.text: I... may glance through some of the books on your shelf from time to time. There's a particularly fascinating encyclopedia of animals. I hope that's alright. I didn't exactly ask...

1.speaker: sol
1.text: Of course it's alright! You saved us from getting chased by a forest squirrel.

1.speaker: dolly
1.text: Oh! Well, yes, I suppose you're right. I'm happy I could help.

1.speaker: sol
1.text: C'mon, let's keep going. And avoid any forest squirrels we see on the way, of course.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Look, the forest gets brighter up ahead. I think this is a way out!

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh goodie! And not a scratch on us!

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Yes, not a scratch. We wouldn't want those delicate faces of yours to get damaged, now, would we?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Aaahhh!

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Eep!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Who are you?

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: I am but a humble denizen of this forest. I couldn't help but notice that you two seem... lost.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, y-y-yes, we are a little lost. But we're on our way back to my parents. Right, Dolly?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Meep!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: S-s-she means "yes".

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Ah, splendid. We wouldn't want you two stuck out here alone.

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: I would encourage you to hurry, though. There's only so much sunlight in the day, and the forest is not the most... welcoming... place at night.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Right, well then we should probably be going now.

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Yes, yes. Hurry along. Time is ticking... ha ha...
